verses.verse: Again <WH8671>, in the ninth year<WH8141>, in the tenth<WH6224> month<WH2320>, in the tenth<WH6218> day of the month<WH2320>, the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,
